extension.name: quantumshop
extension.author: virtuemarttemplates.net
extension.description:
quantumshop VirtueMart Template

Template Version: 17.05.2017 3.7.1/3.2.2

Joomla template developed and released by www.virtuemarttemplates.net. This Joomla template IS NOT FREE OR PUBLIC AND CAN NOT BE RESOLED OR REDISTRIBUTED. By downloading and using this template you have agreed to use the template in accordance with the terms of service outlined at www.virtuemarttemplates.net/terms-of-service.html

Website Optimization

Website Security

Join Template Club

field.name: H1Titleimage
field.label: Built-in Site Name
field.description: Selecr your site name image. Click Select button and upload your image to the server. Once your site name image is uploaded to the server you can select it on file list.

field.name: H2Titleimage
field.label: TPL_QUANTUMSHOP_H2TITLEIMAGE_LABEL
field.description: Selecr your slogan image. Click Select button and upload your image to the server. Once your site slogan image is uploaded to the server you can select it on file list.

field.name: usejumptotop
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Jump to up button
field.description: Turn ON/OFF the jump to up button. When set to ON a button will appear on bottom right when you scroll window down.

field.name: bodybackgroundimage
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Select your background image. If empty simple background color chosen via color picker on Color Settings tab or built-in theme background color will be used instead.

field.name: intropalenusecontentwidth
field.label: Use Handler Width
field.description: Select ON to use a handler width. Select OFF to use 100%. Usable only if Modules Width has been set to Fixed

field.description: Select ON to use a handler width. Select OFF to use 100%. Usable only if Modules Width has been set to Fixed

field.name: fontweight
field.label: Default Font Weight
field.description: Select default font weight for your website.Please note that not all weight values may be supported by selected font family.

field.name: fontfamily
field.label: Default Font Family
field.description: Select serif(Web Safe Font), sans-serif(Web Safe Font), monospace(Web Safe Font) or predefined Google fonts
field.option: Palatino Linotype, Book Antiqua, Palatino, serif
Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif

field.name: addcharacterset
field.label: Select Character Set
field.description:
By default Default Font Family option using only Latin character set. Select this option if you need an additional character set.

IMPORTANT! Please make sure that selected font support your character set. More informations can be found at http://www.google.com/fonts/
field.option: Latin Extended (Open Sans, Roboto, Lato, Oswald, Ubuntu)
Cyrillic (Open Sans, Roboto, PT Sans, Ubuntu)
Cyrillic Extended (Open Sans, Roboto, PT Sans, Ubuntu)

field.label:
Advanced Font Settings
To use more adjusted Google fonts for your website please use fields below.
WARNING! Using many of Google fonts styles may take an impact on your web site load time.

field.name: AdditionalGFontON
field.label: Use additional Google Fonts
field.description: Turn this option ON to add Google fonts for your website.

field.name: AdditionalGFontFamily
field.label: Type Google Font Family Name
field.description: Type here a name of the Google font you want to use

field.name: AdditionalGFontString
field.label: Google Font Family Settings
field.description: Type here your additional Google Fonts settings. See below for more informations about settings up an additional Google Fonts fonts.

field.name: AdditionalGFontTagsAffected
field.default: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .camera_caption, .moduletable_banner
field.label: Tags/CSS Classes affected
field.description: Type here tags and CSS classes you want to use an additional Google Fonts for.

field.name: OverrideDefaultSettings
field.label: Override default settings
field.description: Turn this option ON if you want to override the default font settings and use only Google Fonts settings specified in Google Font Family Settings field

field.label:
How to customize Google Fonts

In fields above you can secify an additional Google Fonts you want to use at your website. You can also set if you want to use your own Google Fonts settings only.

Type Google Font Family Name - in this field type a name of a Google font you want to use. The name must to be typed as same as specified at Google Fonts website, for example: Roboto Condensed

Google Font Family Settings - here you need to provide a font style and character set. For example, to could use latin and greek character set and light,normal and bold font weight type folowing:

300,400,700:latin,greek

To use normal/normal italic and bold/bold italic type following:

400,400italic,700,700italic:latin

Tags/CSS Classes affected - in this field simply provide a selectors you want to use with a specified font

For more informations about the Google Fonts please visit www.google.com/fonts

field.name: sociallabel
field.label: Community Links Label
field.description: Type here the text you want to display next to the icons

field.label: Custom Icon 5 ON/OFF
field.description: Custom Icon 5 ON/OFF

field.name: usecookielaw
field.label: ON/OFF EU Cookie Law Window
field.description: Turn ON this option if you want to use EU Cookie Law Window at your website.

field.name: windowtitle
field.label: Window Title
field.description: Type here a cookies law pop up window title

field.name: windowbody
field.label: Cookie Law Content
field.description: Type here your cookie law text

field.name: agreelinklabel
field.label: Agree Link Label
field.description: Type here a cookies law pop up window agree link label

field.name: learnmorelinklabel
field.label: Learn More Link Label
field.description: Type here a cookies law pop up window learn more link label

field.name: learnmorelink
field.label: Learn More Link
field.description: Put here a link to your cookies policy page

field.name: learnmorelinktargetwindow
field.label: Target Window
field.description: Target browser window when Learn More link is selected

field.name: windowopacity
field.label: Use window opacity
field.description: Type a value between 0 and 1 if you want to use an opacity, for example 0.9 will set opacity to 90%.

field.name: dropdownhandler1
field.label: Min column width (em)
field.description: Set the default drop down handler width

field.name: dropdownhandler1maxwidth
field.label: Max column width (em)
field.description: Set the default drop down handler max width

field.name: dropdownhandler2
field.label: Drop Down 2 columns width (px)
field.description: Change the width for a drop down menu handler (Menu Items sorted in 2 columns)

field.name: dropdownhandler3
field.label: Drop Down 3 columns width (px)
field.description: Change the width for a drop down menu handler (Menu Items sorted in 3 columns)

field.name: dropdownhandler4
field.label: Drop Down 4 columns width (px)
field.description: Change the width for a drop down menu handler (Menu Items sorted in 4 columns)

field.name: dropdownhandler5
field.label: Drop Down 5 columns width (px)
field.description: Change the width for a drop down menu handler (Menu Items sorted in 5 columns)

field.name: selectmegamenu
field.label: Select a menu for Mega Menu
field.description: Select menu you want to use to handle mega menu.

fieldset.name: customcode
fieldset.label: Template Header And Footer Custom Code

field.label: Using text fields below you can put your custom code in the document head and in the footer. This option is very usable if you would like to put Google Analytics or any other 3rd parties.

field.name: headcode
field.label: Insert code into template header
field.description: This field allows to put the code between [head] and [/head]

field.name: footercode
field.label: Insert code into template footer
field.description: This field allows to put the code before the closing [/body] tag

field.name: cam_turnOn
field.label: Turn Slideshow ON/OFF
field.description: Set On if you would like to use built-in slideshow. Set OFF if you are planning to use any 3rd party extensions.

field.name: cam_autoAdvance
field.label: Turn ON/OFF autoplaying
field.description: Turn On if you would like to your slideshow to play automatically once your website load

field.name: cam_mobileAutoAdvance
field.label: Turn ON/OFF autoplaying for mobiles
field.description: Turn On if you would like to your slideshow to play automatically once your website load on mobile devices

field.name: cam_slideOn
field.label: Slide Effect On
field.description: Decide if the transition effect will be applied to the current (prev) or the next slide

field.name: cam_thumbnails
field.label: Turn ON/OFF thumbnails
field.description: Turn On thumbnails for slideshow

field.name: cam_time
field.label: Slide Duration (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the nex one

field.name: cam_transPeriod
field.label: Animation Duration (ms)
field.description: Lenght of the sliding effect in milliseconds

field.name: cam_cols
field.label: Columns for images transitions
field.description: Type a number of columns you want to split images during transitions

field.name: cam_rows
field.label: Rows for images transitions
field.description: Type a number of rows you want to split images during transitions

field.name: cam_slicedCols
field.label: Columns for sliced images transitions
field.description: Type a number of columns you want to slice images during transitions

field.name: cam_slicedRows
field.label: Rows for sliced images transitions
field.description: Type a number of rows you want to slice images during transitions

field.name: cam_fx
field.label: Choose FX Effects
field.description: Select a fx effect for the slides transitions.

field.name: cam_fx_multiple_on
field.label: Use Multiple FX Effects
field.description:
You can also use more than one effect, just type an effects names in field below. Separate values with commas:

simpleFade, scrollRight, scrollBottom

field.label:
FX Effects:
simpleFade, curtainTopLeft, curtainTopRight, curtainBottomLeft,
curtainBottomRight, curtainSliceLeft, curtainSliceRight, blindCurtainTopLeft,
blindCurtainTopRight, blindCurtainBottomLeft, blindCurtainBottomRight,
blindCurtainSliceBottom, blindCurtainSliceTop, stampede,
mosaic, mosaicReverse, mosaicRandom, mosaicSpiral, mosaicSpiralReverse,
topLeftBottomRight, bottomRightTopLeft, bottomLeftTopRight,
bottomLeftTopRight, scrollLeft, scrollRight, scrollHorz, scrollBottom, scrollTop

field.name: cam_fx_multi
field.label: Multiple FX Effects
field.description:
Type and separate an effects names with commas, for example:

simpleFade, scrollRight, scrollBottom

field.name: cam_gridDifference
field.label: Grid Difference
field.description: To make the grid blocks slower than the slices, this value must be smaller than Animation Duration

field.name: cam_height
field.label: Height
field.description: Here you can type pixels (for example 300px), a percentage (relative to the width of the slideshow, for instance 50%) or auto

field.name: cam_minHeight
field.label: Min Height
field.description: Here you can type pixels (for example 300px), a percentage (relative to the width of the slideshow, for instance 50%) or you can also leave it empty

field.name: cam_hover
field.label: Pause on state hover
field.description: Pause on state hover. Not available for mobile devices

field.name: cam_loader
field.label: Loader
field.description: Choose loader style. Even if you choose pie, old browsers like IE8 can't display it. They will display always a loading bar instead.

field.name: cam_barDirection
field.label: Bar Direction
field.description: Choose Bar Direction

field.name: cam_barPosition
field.label: Bar Position
field.description: Choose Bar Position

field.name: cam_pieDiameter
field.label: Pie Diameter
field.description: Type Pie Diameter

field.name: cam_piePosition
field.label: Pie Position
field.description: Choose Pie Position

field.name: cam_loaderColor
field.label: Loader Color
field.description: Choose Loader Color

field.name: cam_loaderBgColor
field.label: Loader Background Color
field.description: Choose Loader Background Color

field.name: cam_loaderOpacity
field.label: Loader Opacity
field.description: Choose loader opacity

field.name: cam_loaderPadding
field.label: Loader Padding
field.description: Choose how many empty pixels you want to display between the loader and its background

field.name: cam_loaderStroke
field.label: Loader Stroke
field.description: The thickness both of the pie loader and of the bar loader. Remember: for the pie, the loader thickness must be less than a half of the Pie Diameter

field.name: cam_navigation
field.label: Navigation
field.description: Display navigation buttons

field.name: cam_playPause
field.label: Play/Pause
field.description: Display play/pause buttons

field.name: cam_navigationHover
field.label: Navigation Hover
field.description: If true the navigation button (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always

field.name: cam_mobileNavHover
field.label: Mobile Navigation Hover
field.description: If true the navigation button on Mobile devices (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always

field.name: cam_opacityOnGrid
field.label: Opacity On Grid
field.description: Decide to apply a fade effect to blocks and slices. If your slideshow is fullscreen or just big, it is strongly recommended to set it to false to have a smoother effect

field.name: cam_pagination
field.label: Pagination
field.description: Display Pagination

field.name: cam_pauseOnClick
field.label: Pause On Click
field.description: This option stops the slideshow when you click the sliders.

field.name: cam_portrait
field.label: Portrait
field.description: Select true if you don't want that your images are cropped

field.name: cam_captionTop2
field.label: Caption Position (space from top)
field.description: Set Caption 2 spacing from top

field.name: slick_pagination
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Pagination
field.description: Turn ON/OFF Pagination

field.name: slick_fade
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Fading
field.description: Turn ON/OFF Fading

field.name: slick_autoplay
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Auto-playing
field.description: Turn ON/OFF Auto-playing

field.name: slick_pauseOnHover
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Pause On Mouse Move
field.description: Turn ON/OFF Pause On Mouse Move

field.name: slickplayspeed
field.label: Slides speed
field.description: Slides speed in milisecends

field.name: sl_pagination
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Pagination
field.description: Turn ON/OFF Pagination

field.name: sl_paginationSpeed
field.label: Pagination speed in milliseconds
field.description: Pagination speed in milliseconds

field.name: sl_autoPlay
field.label: Auto Play
field.description: Auto Play speed in milliseconds. Keep 'false' to turn off auto play

field.name: sl_slideSpeed
field.label: Slide speed in milliseconds
field.description: Slide speed in milliseconds

field.name: sl_rewindSpeed
field.label: Rewind speed in milliseconds
field.description: Rewind speed in milliseconds

field.name: sl_stopOnHover
field.label: Turn ON/OFF autoplay on mouse hover

field.name: sl_scrollPerPage
field.label: Turn ON/OFF scroll per page not per item

field.name: sl_paginationNumbers
field.label: Turn ON/OFF numbers inside pagination buttons

field.name: sl_responsiveRefreshRate
field.label: Window Refresh Rate
field.description: Check window width changes every 200ms for responsive actions

field.name: sl_dragBeforeAnimFinish
field.label: Turn ON/OFF Drag during animations
field.description: Ignore whether a transition is done or not (only dragging)

field.name: testi_title
field.label: Testimonials Box Label
field.description: Type label visible above testimonials

field.name: testi_desc
field.label: Testimonials Box Description
field.description: Type description visible above testimonials

field.name: testisl_items
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: This variable allows you to set the maximum amount of items displayed at a time with the widest browser width

field.name: testisl_itemsDesktop
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: Set for devices smaller than 1600px of width

field.name: testisl_itemsDesktopSmall
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: Set for devices smaller than 1260px of width

field.name: testisl_itemsTablet
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: Set for devices smaller than 1000px of width

field.name: testisl_itemsTabletSmall
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: Set for devices smaller than 768px of width

field.name: testisl_itemsMobile
field.label: Default Number of items
field.description: Set for devices smaller than 480px of width

field.description: Turn ON/OFF Pagination

field.label: Pagination speed in milliseconds

field.name: useZoom
field.label: ON/OFF Zoom Images Script
field.description: Select ON to use Zoom script for your product image in Product Details. If OFF then the default VirtueMart solution will be used

field.name: zoomType
field.label: Select Zoom Type
field.description: Select a type of Zoom used for a product images.

field.name: lensShape
field.label: Select Lens Type
field.description: Select a type of Zoom lens

field.name: lensSize
field.label: Lens Size
field.description: Set a lens size

field.name: cursor
field.label: Select Zoom Cursoe
field.description: Select a type of Zoom cursor

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive Mode
field.description: ON/OFF Responsive Mode - high recommended if you are using responsive template

field.label: Left Hand Side Pop Up Box

field.name: HLposition
field.label: Box Position
field.description: Set Box Position Top or Bottom

field.name: HLspaceFrom
field.label: Box Space from Top/Bottom (px)
field.description: Set Box Space from top or bottom.

field.name: HLmaxWidth
field.label: Box Width (px)
field.description: Set Box Width

field.name: HLheight
field.label: Box Height (px)
field.description: Set Box Height

field.name: HLlabelSize
field.label: Box Label Width (px)
field.description: Set Label Width. Please note the label title must be set in module title field in module settings you published into header-left module position.

field.name: HLboxspeed
field.label: Box Animation Speed
field.description: Choose speed level for box animation

field.name: HLmobileVisible
field.label: Visible on mobile phones?
field.description: Set Yes to display pop up box on mobile phones.

field.label: Right Hand Side Pop Up Box

field.name: HRposition
field.label: Box Position
field.description: Set Box Position Top or Bottom

field.name: HRspaceFrom
field.label: Box Space from Top/Bottom (px)
field.description: Set Box Space from top or bottom.

field.name: HRmaxWidth
field.label: Box Width (px)
field.description: Set Box Width

field.name: HRheight
field.label: Box Height (px)
field.description: Set Box Height

field.name: HRlabelSize
field.label: Box Label Width (px)
field.description: Set Label Width. Please note the label title must be set in module title field in module settings you published into header-left module position.

field.name: HRboxspeed
field.label: Box Animation Speed
field.description: Choose speed level for box animation

field.name: HRmobileVisible
field.label: Visible on mobile phones?
field.description: Set Yes to display pop up box on mobile phones.

field.name: usetheme
field.label: Built-in Theme
field.description: Select ON to use one of the built-in themes. Select OFF to customize the template colour scheme.

field.label: To choose your own colors below simply click the text field to open the color selector tool.

field.name: colours_handlers
field.label: If you are getting any troubles with the custom colors please at first make sure you set OFF for Built-in Theme option.
